plot: A 23-hour live telethon with visits from lots of New Zealand celebrities, music, dancing, competitions and other entertainment, to raise money for the children's charity, KidsCan.
title: Big Night In
plot_es: A 23-hour live telethon with visits from lots of New Zealand celebrities, music, dancing, competitions and other entertainment, to raise money for the children's charity, KidsCan.
plot_en: A 23-hour live telethon with visits from lots of New Zealand celebrities, music, dancing, competitions and other entertainment, to raise money for the children's charity, KidsCan.
